description:
A Proposition leads to seduction...
Ezaki Hinami is a photographer in the editorial department at the local newspaper.
Her first love was Shoma, who was an intern teacher when she was a college girl. Time went by, and now they work at the same office, but her strong feelings of passion for him have not changed. One day, Hinami takes Shoma into a "love motel", telling him it was for research. this almond eyed hottie unleashes her many years of oh perverse fantasies upon him.These cock-craving, ball sucking beauties are even serving up poontang in the park.
title: Natural Obsession - Volume IV
